Text:

wtf! this is the demo-version. Have i done something wrong or what? what should i do to get the full-version?
please help me, Â´cos i need it

#Prince12
As usual, this IS a demo version, but it doesn't matter, because it is exactly the same as the full version. Only it is save disabled. And as usual there is a .reg file that must be added to your registry (just double click on it). 

I've scanned with Avast, AdAware, ZoneAlarms Spyware remover and Spybot Search & Destroy and found NOTHING. So I would go as far to say,  that it is clean. 
BUT there is some parts of the .reg-file I don't understand (especially; why the hell are there registrations for FL5 and FL6 in there?!?!
This means that if you have FL6, it'll go back to DEMO mode until you reactivate FL6 with ye old .reg-file)

#o0Gizmo0o
With all the plugins there is in FL7, you really don't need any other samples (I guess you mean .wav and .xi?) 
If you're serious 'bout music making these are what I recommend:
Free plugins:
http://www.greenoak.com/crystal/download.html
http://www.kvraudio.com/get/156.html
You can also search for more free plugins on www.kvraudio.com
Note: I am NOT affiliated with that site in any way, I'm just a musician myself!

Otherwise, there are some plugins (like differetn plugins from Native Instruments) on TPB. Just go search 'em.

enjoy

Vanguard, z3ta, Nexus, Goos VSTs
Vengeance, Vipzone, Soundbreese good samples
